mapper.select: SELECT T1.order_token AS orderToken , T2.shop_nm AS shopName , T3.region_1depth_name AS toRegion1DepthName , T3.region_2depth_name AS toRegion2DepthName , T3.region_3depth_name AS toRegion3DepthName , T3.detail AS toAddressDetail , T1.region_1depth_name AS fromRegion1DepthName , T1.region_2depth_name AS fromRegion2DepthName , T1.region_3depth_name AS fromRegion3DepthName , T1.detail AS fromAddressDetail , (6371 * acos( cos( radians( #{x} ) ) * cos( radians( T3.x) ) * cos( radians( T3.y) - radians(#{y})) + sin( radians(#{x}) ) * sin( radians(T3.x) ) ) ) AS distance FROM orders T1 , shop T2 , shop_building_info T3 WHERE 1=1 AND T1.shop_token = T2.shop_token AND T2.id = T3.shop_id AND T1.status = 'ORDER_COMPLETE' HAVING distance <= 3 ORDER BY distance ASC;
